text: Pierre Durand may refer to: * Pierre Durand (died 1732), French Huguenot pastor and martyr * Pierre Durand Sr. (1931-2016), French Olympic equestrian * Pierre Durand Jr. (born 1955), French Olympic show-jumping champion * Peter Durand, British merchant who patented the tin can ==See also== * Durand (surname)
title: Pierre Durand
